query: SELECT id, accountId, SUBSTRING(clientId, 1, 20) as clientIdPrefix, CASE WHEN refreshToken IS NOT NULL AND refreshToken != '' THEN 'HAS_TOKEN' ELSE 'NO_TOKEN' END as tokenStatus, profileId, region, lastSyncAt FROM amazon_api_credentials;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user GdNjKxkKZgeVtwE.root --database 5MUJ5aHkiAehb9iTzNdxTq --execute SELECT id, accountId, SUBSTRING(clientId, 1, 20) as clientIdPrefix, CASE WHEN refreshToken IS NOT NULL AND refreshToken != '' THEN 'HAS_TOKEN' ELSE 'NO_TOKEN' END as tokenStatus, profileId, region, lastSyncAt FROM amazon_api_credentials;
stdout:
